lines.line: They said I was too small to survive after the fire destroyed my home.
I sat alone by the window, watching the rain fall like my tears.
My eyes were filled with pain and uncertainty.
The world had burned everything I knew.
But something inside me refused to give up.
I started small, learning to move with purpose.
I trained my body to become stronger than my past.
I learned to stand tall on my own two feet.
Now I drive forward with unstoppable determination.
From survivor to warrior – your past doesn't define your future.

parsed_script.full_script: They said I was too small to survive after the fire destroyed my home. I sat alone by the window, watching the rain fall like my tears. My eyes were filled with pain and uncertainty. The world had burned everything I knew. But something inside me refused to give up. I started small, learning to move with purpose. I trained my body to become stronger than my past. I learned to stand tall on my own two feet. Now I drive forward with unstoppable determination. From survivor to warrior – your past doesn't define your future.
